description: All students will return with "appropriate" public health measures in place, the States announced.
title: Coronavirus: Guernsey schools to reopen fully from 8 June
title_page: Coronavirus: Guernsey schools to reopen fully from 8 June - BBC News
maintext: Nurseries and preschools can allow children to return from 1 June, as long as they have submitted plans and received approval to do so, and childminders will be allowed to reopen to all families, ESC said.
